title: @Riot - Add in option to mute champions
body:
Riot, play one game with 2 Ekkos in the match and tell me you haven't memorized all of his shitty dialogue.

CATCH!  HEADS UP!  STEP RIGHT UP!  DO-OVER!  DON'T BLINK!  THINK FAST!  COME GET ME!  MADE IT!  SURPRISE!  TIME SNAP!  GO!  LOOK OUT!  ONE MORE TIME!  REVERSING POLARITY!
